fields.name: type
fields.description: Specifies the particular kind of document referenced.

binding.description: Specifies the particular kind of document referenced.

fields.name: category
fields.description: A categorization for the type of document referenced.

binding.description: A categorization for the type of document referenced.

fields.name: securityLabel
fields.description: A set of Security-Tag codes specifying the level of privacy/security of the Document.

binding.description: A set of Security-Tag codes specifying the level of privacy/security of the Document.

fields.name: content.format
fields.description: An identifier of the document encoding, structure, and template that the document conforms to beyond the base format indicated in the mimeType.

binding.description: An identifier of the document encoding, structure, and template that the document conforms to beyond the base format indicated in the mimeType.
